heading: HB07906
0: AN ACT CREATING THE SOLAR ENERGY DEVELOPMENT CENTER AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07906
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE SOLAR ENERGY DEVELOPMENT CENTER AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Aims to promote the use, research, and distribution of solar energy by creating a center for its utilization and development.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2018-09-12
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY ON 2018-07-30
